content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257572,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t実際にはこの５倍からの人達が・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually, there are about five times as many people as this..."},{"lineNumber":257573,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tえーい、ややこしいのはいい、実際に作戦に使える部隊数が必要なのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn it, complicated stuff aside, we need the actual number of troops we can use in the operation."},{"lineNumber":257574,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tどんどん減っているじゃないか、増員かけてないのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"The numbers are steadily decreasing, aren't you recruiting more?"},{"lineNumber":257575,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t世界の危機なんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a crisis for the whole world!"},{"lineNumber":257576,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tもちろん、各国全力で増員をしているのですが、それ以上に死傷者数が多く","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, every country is recruiting at full force, but the casualties exceed that number,"},{"lineNumber":257577,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t補充が追いつかずに減っている一方に見えてしまうのです","translatedEnglishLine":"so it just looks like the numbers are decreasing because reinforcements can’t keep up."},{"lineNumber":257578,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tよし、俺様がいっちょ声をかけて集めてくるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I’ll go and call out to gather some troops myself."},{"lineNumber":257579,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t俺が魔人を倒しきる前に全滅しては困るからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’d be a problem if you all got wiped out before I finish off the demon lord."},{"lineNumber":257580,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Select"},{"lineNumber":257581,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t＞　リーザス、自由都市方面","translatedEnglishLine":"> Lizas, Free City Side"},{"lineNumber":257582,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t＞　ヘルマン、ゼス方面","translatedEnglishLine":"> Hermann, Zeth Side"},{"lineNumber":257583,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tリーザス城に来たランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has arrived at Lizas Castle."},{"lineNumber":257584,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tリア、マリス、バレス","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria, Maris, Bares"},{"lineNumber":257585,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t兵隊が足りない、なんとか増やせ","translatedEnglishLine":"We don’t have enough soldiers, do something to increase the numbers."},{"lineNumber":257586,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tがんばっているのですが・・と言い訳","translatedEnglishLine":"We’re doing our best…but that’s the excuse."},{"lineNumber":257587,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t兵士の募集要項か・・上は６０歳になっているな。","translatedEnglishLine":"The recruitment requirements, huh... The upper limit is set at 60 years old."},{"lineNumber":257588,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tよし、これを変更だ。そうだな・・８０歳。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, change this. How about 80 years old."},{"lineNumber":257589,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered."},{"lineNumber":257590,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tリーザス城にまだいるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance is still at Lizas Castle."},{"lineNumber":257591,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tそうだな・・もっと兵士を増やそう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then... let’s increase the number of soldiers even more."},{"lineNumber":257592,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t今は下は１６歳からの募集か・・よし、１３歳まで兵士にいける","translatedEnglishLine":"Currently, recruitment starts from 16 years old... Alright, let’s lower it to 13 years old."},{"lineNumber":257593,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t大丈夫、俺もその頃には戦っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s fine, I was fighting at that age too."},{"lineNumber":257594,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tただし、男だけでいいぞ、女の子は怪我させてはなんだしな。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, only boys, alright? I can’t have girls getting injured."},{"lineNumber":257595,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered."},{"lineNumber":257596,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t自由都市、Ｍランドに来たランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has arrived at the Free City, M Land."},{"lineNumber":257597,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t兵士募集が必要だ。コパンドン","translatedEnglishLine":"We need to recruit soldiers. Kopandon."},{"lineNumber":257598,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tあそこにいこう、デンに行き参加兵を集めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go there. Went to Den and gathered participating soldiers."},{"lineNumber":257599,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered."},{"lineNumber":257600,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t自由都市、Ｍランドに来たランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has arrived at the Free City, M Land."},{"lineNumber":257601,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t兵士募集が必要だ。コパンドン","translatedEnglishLine":"We need to recruit soldiers. Kopandon."},{"lineNumber":257602,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t金で傭兵を集めさせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gather mercenaries with money."},{"lineNumber":257603,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t少々やばそうな連中でもいい、そんな奴らの方がやるときにはやる","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s alright even if they seem a bit shady; those kinds tend to actually fight when it matters."},{"lineNumber":257604,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered."},{"lineNumber":257605,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tヘルマンに来たランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has arrived at Hermann."},{"lineNumber":257606,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tシーラ、ペルエレ","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela, Peruele."},{"lineNumber":257607,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tこの国には貧乏人だが屈強な農民が多い","translatedEnglishLine":"This country has many poor but sturdy farmers."},{"lineNumber":257608,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t武具を与えて戦争に駆り出せ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Give them weapons and send them off to war."},{"lineNumber":257609,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t積極的に協力してくれる人はもう参加してくれています","translatedEnglishLine":"Those willing to cooperate actively have already joined."},{"lineNumber":257610,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t参加していないのはそれこそ家族を守る、その日の暮らしで精一杯な人達で・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who haven't joined are the ones barely making a living, protecting their families day by day..."},{"lineNumber":257611,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tだから、そいつらに戦争が終わったら２０年間家族も含めて生活を保障すると言えばいい","translatedEnglishLine":"So, just promise them that when the war ends, their families and they will be guaranteed support for 20 years."},{"lineNumber":257612,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tそんな予算ありません。数万以上ですよね・・","translatedEnglishLine":"We don’t have that kind of budget. It’s tens of thousands, right..."},{"lineNumber":257613,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t大丈夫だ、数万以上集めても戦争が終わる頃には１／１０ぐらいになっているはずだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t worry, even if we gather tens of thousands, by the time the war ends, only about one tenth will remain."},{"lineNumber":257614,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered."},{"lineNumber":257615,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tヘルマンに来たランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has arrived at Hermann."},{"lineNumber":257616,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tシーラ、ペルエレ","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela, Peruele."},{"lineNumber":257617,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t兵隊が足りない、何か使える奴はいないのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"There aren’t enough soldiers. Isn’t there anyone useful..."},{"lineNumber":257618,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tもうすっからかんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"We’re completely out of options."},{"lineNumber":257619,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t囚人移送の話を聞くランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance hears about prisoner transfers."},{"lineNumber":257620,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t囚人がいるじゃないか、何万人もいるんだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are prisoners, right? Tens of thousands of them, aren’t there?"},{"lineNumber":257621,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tこいつらを使おう","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's use these guys."},{"lineNumber":257622,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t駄目です、軽度の犯罪の方はもう軍に参加してもらっています","translatedEnglishLine":"No good. Minor offenders are already enlisted in the army."},{"lineNumber":257623,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t残っているのは重犯罪者ばかりで・・外に出すのは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What remains are mostly serious criminals... letting them out is..."},{"lineNumber":257624,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tいいから、出して最前線に送り込め","translatedEnglishLine":"Enough talk; release them and send them to the front lines."},{"lineNumber":257625,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t生き残ったら無罪放免でいいぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"If they survive, they’ll be pardoned and set free."},{"lineNumber":257626,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t安心しろ、この戦争が終わったら俺が退治してやるから","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t worry, once this war is over, I’ll take care of them."},{"lineNumber":257627,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered."},{"lineNumber":257628,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tゼスに来たランス、臨時首都","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has arrived at Zeth, the temporary capital."},{"lineNumber":257629,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tなんか理由をつけて徴兵","translatedEnglishLine":"Create some reason and conscript soldiers."},{"lineNumber":257630,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered."},{"lineNumber":257631,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tゼスに来たランス、臨時首都","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has arrived at Zeth, the temporary capital."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際にはこの５倍からの人達が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, there are about five times as many people as this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、ややこしいのはいい、実際に作戦に使える部隊数が必要なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, complicated stuff aside, we need the actual number of troops we can use in the operation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんどん減っているじゃないか、増員かけてないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The numbers are steadily decreasing, aren't you recruiting more?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の危機なんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a crisis for the whole world!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろん、各国全力で増員をしているのですが、それ以上に死傷者数が多く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, every country is recruiting at full force, but the casualties exceed that number,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 補充が追いつかずに減っている一方に見えてしまうのです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it just looks like the numbers are decreasing because reinforcements can’t keep up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、俺様がいっちょ声をかけて集めてくるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I’ll go and call out to gather some troops myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が魔人を倒しきる前に全滅しては困るからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’d be a problem if you all got wiped out before I finish off the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Select

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　リーザス、自由都市方面
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Lizas, Free City Side

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ヘルマン、ゼス方面
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hermann, Zeth Side

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城に来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Lizas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス、バレス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Maris, Bares

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵隊が足りない、なんとか増やせ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don’t have enough soldiers, do something to increase the numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がんばっているのですが・・と言い訳
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re doing our best…but that’s the excuse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士の募集要項か・・上は６０歳になっているな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The recruitment requirements, huh... The upper limit is set at 60 years old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、これを変更だ。そうだな・・８０歳。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, change this. How about 80 years old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城にまだいるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance is still at Lizas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな・・もっと兵士を増やそう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then... let’s increase the number of soldiers even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は下は１６歳からの募集か・・よし、１３歳まで兵士にいける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, recruitment starts from 16 years old... Alright, let’s lower it to 13 years old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、俺もその頃には戦っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s fine, I was fighting at that age too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし、男だけでいいぞ、女の子は怪我させてはなんだしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, only boys, alright? I can’t have girls getting injured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市、Ｍランドに来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at the Free City, M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士募集が必要だ。コパンドン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to recruit soldiers. Kopandon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこにいこう、デンに行き参加兵を集めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go there. Went to Den and gathered participating soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市、Ｍランドに来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at the Free City, M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士募集が必要だ。コパンドン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to recruit soldiers. Kopandon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金で傭兵を集めさせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gather mercenaries with money.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少々やばそうな連中でもいい、そんな奴らの方がやるときにはやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s alright even if they seem a bit shady; those kinds tend to actually fight when it matters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Hermann.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela, Peruele.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この国には貧乏人だが屈強な農民が多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This country has many poor but sturdy farmers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武具を与えて戦争に駆り出せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Give them weapons and send them off to war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 積極的に協力してくれる人はもう参加してくれています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those willing to cooperate actively have already joined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参加していないのはそれこそ家族を守る、その日の暮らしで精一杯な人達で・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who haven't joined are the ones barely making a living, protecting their families day by day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、そいつらに戦争が終わったら２０年間家族も含めて生活を保障すると言えばいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, just promise them that when the war ends, their families and they will be guaranteed support for 20 years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな予算ありません。数万以上ですよね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don’t have that kind of budget. It’s tens of thousands, right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だ、数万以上集めても戦争が終わる頃には１／１０ぐらいになっているはずだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t worry, even if we gather tens of thousands, by the time the war ends, only about one tenth will remain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Hermann.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela, Peruele.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵隊が足りない、何か使える奴はいないのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There aren’t enough soldiers. Isn’t there anyone useful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうすっからかんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re completely out of options.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囚人移送の話を聞くランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance hears about prisoner transfers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囚人がいるじゃないか、何万人もいるんだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are prisoners, right? Tens of thousands of them, aren’t there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつらを使おう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's use these guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目です、軽度の犯罪の方はもう軍に参加してもらっています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good. Minor offenders are already enlisted in the army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残っているのは重犯罪者ばかりで・・外に出すのは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What remains are mostly serious criminals... letting them out is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいから、出して最前線に送り込め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enough talk; release them and send them to the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き残ったら無罪放免でいいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they survive, they’ll be pardoned and set free.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安心しろ、この戦争が終わったら俺が退治してやるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t worry, once this war is over, I’ll take care of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに来たランス、臨時首都
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Zeth, the temporary capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか理由をつけて徴兵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Create some reason and conscript soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに来たランス、臨時首都
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Zeth, the temporary capital.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Went to Den and gathered participating soldiers."},{"lineNumber":257599,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered."},{"lineNumber":257600,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t自由都市、Ｍランドに来たランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has arrived at the Free City, M Land."},{"lineNumber":257601,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t兵士募集が必要だ。コパンドン","translatedEnglishLine":"We need to recruit soldiers. translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際にはこの５倍からの人達が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, there are about five times as many people as this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、ややこしいのはいい、実際に作戦に使える部隊数が必要なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, complicated stuff aside, we need the actual number of troops we can use in the operation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんどん減っているじゃないか、増員かけてないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The numbers are steadily decreasing, aren't you recruiting more?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の危機なんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a crisis for the whole world!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろん、各国全力で増員をしているのですが、それ以上に死傷者数が多く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, every country is recruiting at full force, but the casualties exceed that number,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 補充が追いつかずに減っている一方に見えてしまうのです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it just looks like the numbers are decreasing because reinforcements can’t keep up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、俺様がいっちょ声をかけて集めてくるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I’ll go and call out to gather some troops myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が魔人を倒しきる前に全滅しては困るからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’d be a problem if you all got wiped out before I finish off the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Select

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　リーザス、自由都市方面
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Lizas, Free City Side

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ヘルマン、ゼス方面
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hermann, Zeth Side

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城に来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Lizas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス、バレス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Maris, Bares

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵隊が足りない、なんとか増やせ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don’t have enough soldiers, do something to increase the numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がんばっているのですが・・と言い訳
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re doing our best…but that’s the excuse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士の募集要項か・・上は６０歳になっているな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The recruitment requirements, huh... The upper limit is set at 60 years old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、これを変更だ。そうだな・・８０歳。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, change this. How about 80 years old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城にまだいるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance is still at Lizas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな・・もっと兵士を増やそう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then... let’s increase the number of soldiers even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は下は１６歳からの募集か・・よし、１３歳まで兵士にいける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, recruitment starts from 16 years old... Alright, let’s lower it to 13 years old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、俺もその頃には戦っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s fine, I was fighting at that age too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし、男だけでいいぞ、女の子は怪我させてはなんだしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, only boys, alright? I can’t have girls getting injured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市、Ｍランドに来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at the Free City, M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士募集が必要だ。コパンドン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to recruit soldiers. Kopandon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこにいこう、デンに行き参加兵を集めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go there. Went to Den and gathered participating soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市、Ｍランドに来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at the Free City, M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士募集が必要だ。コパンドン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to recruit soldiers. Kopandon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金で傭兵を集めさせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gather mercenaries with money.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少々やばそうな連中でもいい、そんな奴らの方がやるときにはやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s alright even if they seem a bit shady; those kinds tend to actually fight when it matters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Hermann.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela, Peruele.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この国には貧乏人だが屈強な農民が多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This country has many poor but sturdy farmers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武具を与えて戦争に駆り出せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Give them weapons and send them off to war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 積極的に協力してくれる人はもう参加してくれています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those willing to cooperate actively have already joined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参加していないのはそれこそ家族を守る、その日の暮らしで精一杯な人達で・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who haven't joined are the ones barely making a living, protecting their families day by day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、そいつらに戦争が終わったら２０年間家族も含めて生活を保障すると言えばいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, just promise them that when the war ends, their families and they will be guaranteed support for 20 years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな予算ありません。数万以上ですよね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don’t have that kind of budget. It’s tens of thousands, right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だ、数万以上集めても戦争が終わる頃には１／１０ぐらいになっているはずだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t worry, even if we gather tens of thousands, by the time the war ends, only about one tenth will remain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに来たランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Hermann.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela, Peruele.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵隊が足りない、何か使える奴はいないのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There aren’t enough soldiers. Isn’t there anyone useful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうすっからかんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re completely out of options.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囚人移送の話を聞くランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance hears about prisoner transfers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囚人がいるじゃないか、何万人もいるんだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are prisoners, right? Tens of thousands of them, aren’t there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつらを使おう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's use these guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目です、軽度の犯罪の方はもう軍に参加してもらっています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good. Minor offenders are already enlisted in the army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残っているのは重犯罪者ばかりで・・外に出すのは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What remains are mostly serious criminals... letting them out is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいから、出して最前線に送り込め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enough talk; release them and send them to the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き残ったら無罪放免でいいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they survive, they’ll be pardoned and set free.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安心しろ、この戦争が終わったら俺が退治してやるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t worry, once this war is over, I’ll take care of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに来たランス、臨時首都
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Zeth, the temporary capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか理由をつけて徴兵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Create some reason and conscript soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers have been gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに来たランス、臨時首都
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has arrived at Zeth, the temporary capital.
